programme.title: Mr. Right
programme.desc: Charlotte’s taking her chance in the big city. She just began working for the hottest romance site writing their hit weekly dating article, and her new best friend, Lila, is as fun as she is loyal. She also befriends a coffee barista, Liam, who shows her all the best spots in the city. But dating a new guy each week to write about is making her feel burned out. And when Liam develops feelings for her, Charlotte will need to decide whether her work is more important than her chance at love.

programme.title: Our Take on Love
programme.desc: When unlucky-in-love Isabella and filmmaker Blake find themselves planning a huge celebration in a mansion, neither knew what they'd find. They unexpectedly find a love and adventure they never knew could be true.

programme.title: My Perfect Romance
programme.desc: Robinson Tech is launching a new dating service that they ensure will find your Perfect Match. But when its's CEO and tech developer are challenged on Live TV to test the service themselves, the algorithm shows some interesting results.

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice
programme.desc: Elizabeth Bennet is a hard-working, intelligent college student who won't even think about marriage until she graduates. But when she meets Jack Wickham, a good-looking playboy, and Darcy, a sensible businessman, Elizabeth's determination is put to the test. Will she see through their exteriors and discover their true intentions? Based on Jane Austen's timeless tale Pride and Prejudice.

programme.title: Love marks the Spot
programme.desc: In order to save the publishing company where she works from being sold, junior editor Becca has to travel to Arcania with famed action star Lee to secure the movie rights to the popular "Lover's Quest" series.

programme.title: Christmas Angel
programme.desc: Ashley feels alone this Christmas as she searches fruitlessly for a job to support herself and her dog, Dash. But her neighbor Nick knows exactly what to do. He offers her a job as his assistant in the best work of all----helping others. There's only one catch: Ashley can't tell anyone that her boss is a sort of Secret Santa. When a nosy reporter, Will, takes interest in Ashley, she struggles to keep Nick's secret while protecting her heart.

programme.title: Christmas At The Holly Hotel
programme.desc: Kathy, a food critic in New York City, returns home for Christmas at the request of her parents. There she meets a handsome police officer, which now complicates her situation.

programme.title: Miracle In East Texas
programme.desc: Two con men try to convince a group of widows to invest in worthless oil wells during the Great Depression.

programme.title: My Perfect Romance
programme.desc: Robinson Tech is launching a new dating service that they ensure will find your Perfect Match. But when its's CEO and tech developer are challenged on Live TV to test the service themselves, the algorithm shows some interesting results.

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice
programme.desc: Elizabeth Bennet is a hard-working, intelligent college student who won't even think about marriage until she graduates. But when she meets Jack Wickham, a good-looking playboy, and Darcy, a sensible businessman, Elizabeth's determination is put to the test. Will she see through their exteriors and discover their true intentions? Based on Jane Austen's timeless tale Pride and Prejudice.

programme.title: Love marks the Spot
programme.desc: In order to save the publishing company where she works from being sold, junior editor Becca has to travel to Arcania with famed action star Lee to secure the movie rights to the popular "Lover's Quest" series.

programme.title: Austentatious
programme.desc: Lizzie closes the house for Darcy and finally meets the woman he bought it for: his sister. Lizzie’s opinion of Darcy sky-rockets, and there’s a spark between them. Elinor breaks her toe, and Brandon comes by to help her. He pines after Marianne and resolves to ask her out. Each time he tries to ask her out, he is thwarted by interruptions. Just as he’s about to get his chance, Marianne comes home, excited about a guy she met: John Willoughby. Grant tells Emma he’s taking her out on a date to cheer her up. But Emma comes down with a cold. Instead, Grant takes her home and tends to her. They talk about Emma’s father and have a comfortable evening. Grant admits he just wanted to spend time with Emma.

When a nosy reporter, Will, takes interest in Ashley, she struggles to keep Nick's secret while protecting her heart.
